name: DM Mono
description: DM Mono is a three weight, three style family designed for DeepMind. DM Mono was loosely based off of DM Sans , with a reduction in contrast and less geometric proportions. The type design and font development was commissioned from Colophon Foundry , with Creative Direction from the DeepMind team. To contribute, see github.com/googlefonts/dm-mono .
author: Colophon Foundry
